<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Loaner Vehicle 2">aa21b469834c1610b807c1ffeeaad39a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:85557cad834c1610b807c1ffeeaad33d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Vehicle Availability Validation</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

		var ga = new GlideAjax('getStatus');
		var vehStatus = g_form.getValue("select_the_vehicle_that_you_need");
    ga.addParam('sysparm_x_1399238_lva_lvr', 'status');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_x_1399238_lva_lvr', 'number');
    ga.getXML(vehicleStatus);

	/*
		//if(answer ='Out on Field')
	g_form.addErrorMessage('Vehicle not available on those dates');
	g_form.clearValue('select_the_vehicle_that_you_need');

}
    function vehicleStatus(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("status");
        g_form.setValue("status",answer);

*/
	function vehicleStatus (response){
	var vehiStatus = g_form.getReference('status');
    var vehiSelect = g_form.getReference('number');
	
    if(vehiStatus =='Out on Field') {

        g_form.addErrorMessage('Vehicle not available on those dates');
        g_form.clearValue('date_to_return_the_vehicle');

        return false;
    }
	}
    return true; 
	

   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-22 17:42:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f8b31cbb8344d210b807c1ffeeaad333</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Vehicle Availability Validation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_1399238_lva">0e804ac483334e10b807c1ffeeaad3df</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">0e804ac483334e10b807c1ffeeaad3df</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f8b31cbb8344d210b807c1ffeeaad333</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-22 18:53:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
